name: 10 Minutes Past 4:20
description:
W - Climp Up S - Climb Down A - Move Left D - Move Right SPACEBAR - Jump E - Rehab Menu(Press The Key associated with the movement you would like to regain in the menu)

Hi kids, this is what happens when you do drugs. You'll lose control one by one till you can't move anywhere and meet your demise
The more you move, the faster you lose control.

Disclaimer-Warning

This game does not promote any Drugs. 

It is solely a game to spread awareness of the illegal consumption of drugs 

This game is a social awareness campaign, Studio oofDa, and its associates do not promote the use of any narcotic substance.
